ygData.subject: Re: New bard website
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree that you a great site and it is in my favorite folder for sure. You have done a great job presenting information all Bards need to see IMHO! Thanks for
ygData.messageBody:
I agree that you a great site and it is in my favorite
folder for sure. You have done a great job presenting
information all Bards need to see IMHO! Thanks for all
the hard work to you all that helped put it all
together for us! Good Links also.

Talbas
Singer of the Ninth Song
Xegony
Lear-Cleric Shadoleaf-Druid Fabien-Enchanter

--- Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...> wrote:
> > EQ Bard Song Analysis
> > http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
>
> Not bad. I like it, and it's bookmarked.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
